info.name: Dark start.me
info.description: Start.me but darker, rounder and slightly cleaner
info.additionalInfo:
12-1
- Updated to work with latest start.me update
- Dark widgets can now be turned off
- More updates to come once start.me fixes broken things
7-11
- Rewrote code after update broke things
- More darkness and roundness
- Added options to adjust opacity of things
1-23-18
- Updated to minimize clutter from newest update
11-18-17
- Initial release

options.label: Yes
